text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: An extension to provide a comment on the linguistic proficiency. When using sign language, this field can be used to clarify, for example, which sign language is used. This can be informative, as there is not always a one-to-one relationship between the spoken language and sign language.

purpose.value: This extension represents the Comment concept of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) LanguageProficiency v4.0 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/LanguageProficiency-v4.0(2024EN)).
